text: Hi there, how are you?
I'm okay. I've been pretty tired lately. How are you?
Me too! It's been raining so much in my area...hard to not be tired! Do you have time for me to tell you about my favorite charity?
We haven't gotten much rain, I just have a new baby, so I guess it is to be expected. Sure I'd love to hear about it.
New baby...I barely remember those days...probably because I was exhausted.  After I had my baby, I started becoming interested in the charity, Save the Children.  Have you heard of them?
Yes I have but I don't know much about what they do.
They are an organization that helps support children in developing countries.  It's hard to realize how fortunate we are to have the resources we do.
What kinds of things do they do for children? Is it nutrition related? Or education?
They help in pretty much every area.  Fight fornchildrens rights, get them healthcare, help with education, etc.  Do you currently donate to any charities?
I do. We donate to St Jude's regularly and do a fundraiser for the CF Foundation every year.

Those are both great foundations too! If you ever have any extra to spare, you should consider donating to Save the Children too.  When I read about what they do, I just feel so blessed to have my baby safe with me.
We do often take things like that for granted.  Do you know how much of donations go directly to the charity. Some foundations do a better job then others.
A little over 80% go right to helping.  Around 10% is used for fundraising.  The rest just keeps the foundation operating.  They do a good job of allocating resources.
Sounds like they a good job.  I would like to make a donation.
Great! You can actually donate any amount of your earnings today.  Any amount helps as you know.
How do I do it? Do I just say the amount?
At the end, you'll be asked how koch of your $2 that you'd like to donate.  You'll enter the amount and the researchers will make sure the funds get to the organization.
OK that sounds easy. Thank you for all of your knowledge on this subject.
Thanks for listening.  You are obviously a very giving person.  I hope you get some rest!
Thank you, me too! haha! Have a great weekend.
